You decide that you won't let that boat leave your eyes. You quitely step behind some bushes closer to the boat, and continue to listen.

The two workers begin unloading large wooden crates off of the boat. Most boxes have a red paint lable saying "fragile" on at least two of their sides. As this is happeneing a woman dressed in similar yet more formal attire approaches the boat.

"Go to the market and help set up the food," She instructs sternly.

The two men nod silently and quickly put down what they're carrying. They walk off of the wooden boards of the docks and head in the direction of the market.

Continue watching the docksFollow the workers to the market
